22 report my name is dave and this is

the central bank's they're continually
keeping the illusion alive that
everything is fine but what we're

prior to that actually people were

started to move up and many of the
people had adjustable rate mortgages
they couldn't afford them people were

trying to sell their houses because
there were no buyers they just left them
and we're starting to see something like

talking about as we continue on here
we're going to see cracks in the economy
the illusion is going to start to fall
apart remember the administration that
is in the United States right now is
leaving there's a new administration
coming in and they set this up to

well they took some pictures and what
they found was that there are

this would have been considered fake

again now in Venezuela we're seeing that

says it takes almost six minutes for it
to spit out 3,500 Boulevard at a shot
and they walk away with a huge stack but
it's really only worth five dollars and
thirty-two cents and what they're seeing
there is hyperinflation at this point
it's very difficult to get the currency

above
of three percent and they're playing on
